title: Verhaalpaal Noord
description: Did you know that Overhoeks is the oldest part of Amsterdam-Noord? And that just behind Eye was the gallows field of Amsterdam? Storypaal Noord is an open-air exhibition about the unknown history of Amsterdam-Noord. Within 45 minutes you walk from pole to pole and you will learn everything about this dynamic district.

title: Openluchttentoonstelling - Elephant Parade Amsterdam Tour 2025
description: Elephant Parade and Biz Damrak Amsterdam are organizing a special open -air exhibition with the Beursplein as the starting point. From 19 May to 29 June 2025, 14 hand -painted elephants and one duck are exhibited. The exhibition in Amsterdam promises to be a visual spectacle that brings together art, culture and nature conservation in an iconic location: Beursplein.

title: Dijkreis
description: Go on a journey of discovery through the turbulent history of Amsterdam-Noord. In forty special stories you learn about the history of Amsterdam-Noord on the place where it actually took place.

title: Ontdek Oosterdok: interactieve wandelroute in Amsterdam
description: The Oosterdok in Amsterdam is launching Oosterdok: a new interactive walking route with which residents and visitors can discover the hidden stories of this neighborhood. Along the way you will learn more about the transformation of the Oosterdok through games and stories: from the largest port in the world to a bustling place for culture, architecture and innovation.

title: BioBlitz Amsterdamse Bos 2025
description: From 24 May to 24 June, the Amsterdamse Bos will turn into a vibrant research area for nature lovers, discoverers and curious visitors. The Bioblitz is back! During this monthly Nature Challenge we will look together for as many types of plants, animals, fungi and other organisms in the Amsterdamse Bos.

title: Queer Geschiedenismaand - expositie Buiten beeld?
description: Queer objects from 5 Dutch museums and archives. Five Dutch museums and archives put an object with queer-theme from their own collection in the spotlights at Ihlia LGBTI Heritage in OBA Oosterdok in the context of the annual queer history month (March). The objects are, framed with Ihlia archive material, equipped with queer historical context. The exhibition can be viewed for free until 15 June.
price_text: Queer objecten uit 5 Nederlandse musea en archieven. Vijf Nederlandse musea en archieven zetten bij IHLIA LGBTI Heritage in OBA Oosterdok een object met queer-thematiek uit hun eigen collectie in de spotlights in het kader van de jaarlijkse Queer Geschiedenismaand (maart). De objecten worden, omlijst met IHLIA archiefmateriaal, voorzien van queer historische context. De tentoonstelling is tot 15 juni gratis te bezichtigen.

title: Kees te Kolsté - Solo - Reflections of a living Master
description: Kees te Kolsté - Solo: Reflections of a Living Master, shows impressive works from his artistic career that covers more than five decades.

title: Wandeling Amsterdam 750 hectometer
description: Discover the oldest, newest and greenest parts of the city during this 75 km walk. The walk is divided into 4 stages, but you can also walk the route in more or less days. With a bonus stage you also get through the Weesp district. You can walk the route when it suits you!

title: Wunderships
description: In the Expo Wunderships in NDSM Fuse, artists look for something that inspires them or for which they hope. That can be a better future, recognition, balance, guidance, pleasure, or just rest. They do that with softness and patience. Aware of everything that is vulnerable. They have hope, doubt and believe in love. And they like to hoist that in the mast or let travel in the wind to ever arrive in a new world full of safety, a healthy nature, trust, freedom, respect, equality, diversity and pleasure.

title: Tentoonstelling: My veins don't end in me
description: Exhibition by South Asian Contemporary Art Amsterdam 'My Veins Don't End in Me' with the work of Aditi Singh, Amina Ahmed, Tanuja Rane, Varunika Saraf. The work South Asian modern art can only be viewed by appointment. If you want to come by, send an e-mail art@sacartamsterdam.com.

title: Tentoonstelling “De Amsterdamse Gevel” in de Amstelkerk
description: Stadsherstel Amsterdam organizes the exhibition "De Amsterdamse Gevel" in the Amstelkerk. In this exhibition they show various Amsterdam facades that the city has.

title: 750 mensen, één stad
description: After two and a half years of hard work, the volunteers Stefanie Swinkels, Alphons Nieuwenhuis and Michel Bouquet are almost successful: the coffee table book '750 people, one city' is almost ready. The corresponding exhibition can be seen in the garden of De Nederlandsche Bank from 9 May. Access to this event is free and can be visited on 16 May from 12:00.
price_text: Na twee en een half jaar hard werken zijn de vrijwilligers Stefanie Swinkels, Alphons Nieuwenhuis en Michel Bouquet bijna geslaagd: het koffietafelboek '750 mensen, één stad' is bijna klaar. De bijbehorende tentoonstelling is vanaf 9 mei te zien in de tuin van De Nederlandsche Bank. Toegang tot dit evenement is gratis en op 16 mei vanaf 12:00 te bezoeken.

title: Onderstebodem
description: This exhibition literally brings out the bottom by thoroughly examining our relationship with the soil.

title: Moco Masters
description: The modern masters have inspired countless generations and art lovers worldwide. Every master has a unique vision. They use their moment in time to think about the future and present it. They dare to change our world and create work that becomes timeless. With their worldwide impact, Moco Modern Masters found their way to homes and museums around the world - where they shape our collective consciousness. Their names, art and ideas are deeply intertwined in the fabric of our daily lives. Andy Warhol, Jean-Michel Basquiat, Keith Haring, Yayoi Kusama-all icons.

title: Robbie Williams: Pride and Self-Prejudice
description: Robbie Williams, once the radiant center of Take That and now a solo legend, mixes charisma with depth in his music and thus touches many fans. Robbie has reinvented himself with every hit, making him one of the most iconic and versatile British pop stars in the books. His journey, which once started in the shadows of a rehab clinic, shows in Moco Museum how he has transformed his darkest moments into light points.

title: Gratis tentoonstelling in de Rjjksmuseumtuinen: Isamu Noguchi
description: Image of © The Isamu Noguchi Foundation and Garden Museum New York, C/O Pictoright Amsterdam 2025
price_text: Gratis tentoonstelling in de Rjjksmuseumtuinen: Isamu Noguchi

title: I amsterdam Store
description: The I Amsterdam Store at Central Station is the place for everyone who wants to know what to do in the capital and wants to be inspired by the best Amsterdam has to offer.
date_text: **Donderdag 26 Juni** 09:00-17:00 Uur Open In Plaats Van 09:00-19:00 Uur.
price_text: Met de City Card krijg je 10% korting op I amsterdam merchandise.[Bekijk alle City Card locaties](https://www.iamsterdam.com/uit/agenda?voordeel_met_de_city_card=freecard&voordeel_met_de_city_card=discountcard&voordeel_met_de_city_card=giftcard)[Meer informatie over de City Card](https://www.iamsterdam.com/tickets/i-amsterdam-city-card)
